page.title: 15**** HOME LIFE 2 ****
page.content: FOOD a typical weekday menu for a child of 9. BREAKFAST. (7.45 a.m.) Toast and / or cereal. Toast is heated bread, cereal is a grain based food ie toasted wheat, rice or maize usually served with milk and sugar. Oats mixed with milk and sugar is another popular breakfast meal. Toast is usually eaten with margarine or butter and topped with jam or marmalade. Other breakfast meals : bacon, egg beans sausage boiled egg, scrambled egg, poached egg. Traditionally the mother has been the main cook in the family our survey showed that many dads enjoyed the role of cooking. (cont on page 17)
